project.description_first_project:
Please add your first project to begin using Armo.
You can add more projects later.
project.description_choose_category: Choose a category for your project to help us tailor our services to your needs.
project.choose_name_description2: The name must not contain: spaces, _ , . , ) , / , : , ;
project.choose_name_description3: It is better that the Project Name matches your product’s code
project.project_name_condition_1: Project name must start with a letter and can only contain letters, numbers, and dashes
project.project_image_size_1mb: Image size should be less than 1 MB
project.project_image_info2: The image format must be JPG or PNG.
project.project_image_info3: The file must be less than 1 MB.
project.project_image_info4: The image must be transparent in PNG format.
project.project_image_info5: The image must be from the front view and includes only one earring (not a pair).
project.project_image_info6: The image must be from the front view
project.project_3d_info:
To start your project, upload the 3D file here.
If you don't have a 3D file, we can assist you in creating one.
project.project_3d_info3: The file must be less than 15 MB
project.file_size_15mb: File size should be less than 15 MB
project.thank_you_for_submitting:
Congratulations! Your project has been successfully created.
To access details and obtain the AR link, simply click the 'Project Information' button.
project.project_image_info:
To initiate your project, upload a photo of the desired 
product in this section.Prior to uploading, please review the
specified guidelines to ensure the accurate construction of your project.
project.publish_your_ar: Publish your AR project across your platforms
project.are_you_sure: Are you sure want to delete?
project.rows_delete: Are you sure want to delete $ items?
project.error_csv: Unable to export CSV: projects, data, or items is undefined
project.build_your_project_upload_photos: To build your project, upload photos of products in this section
project.selected_size_applied_all: The selected size is applied to all projects.
project.choose_carpet_size: Choose carpet size in square meter
project.enter_dimensions_carpet_consider_length_: To enter the dimensions of the carpet, consider its length and width. If the desired dimensions are not among the options, use the “other” option and write the dimensions in the box.
project.guide_enter_length_width: Guide to enter the length and width of the carpet:
project.projects_named_according_photos: Projects are named according to the names of the photos.
project.better_project_name_code: It is better that the Project Name matches your product’s code
project.photos_front_view_without_extra_borders: The photos should be from the front view and without extra borders
project.size_each_photo_must_1mb: The size of each photo must be less than 1 MB.
project.maximum_10_photos_error: You can only upload a maximum of 10 photos.
project.one_file_required: At least one file is required
project.choose_frame_size: Choose frame size in square meter
project.enter_dimensions_frame_consider_length_w: To enter the dimensions of the frame, consider its length and width. If the desired dimensions are not among the options, use the “other” option and write the dimensions in the box.
project.choose_wallpaper_size: Choose wallpaper size in square meter
project.choose_how_put_wallpaper: Choose how to put the wallpaper on the wall
project.choose_stone_ceramic_flooring_size: Choose stone and ceramic size in square meter
project.choose_stone_ceramic_wall_covering_size: Choose stone and ceramic size in square meter
project.choose_how_put_stone_ceramic_wall_coveri: Choose how to put the stone and ceramic on the wall
project.choose_how_put_stone_ceramic_flooring: Choose how to put the stone and ceramic on the floor
project.choose_curtain_size: Choose curtain size in square meter
project.required_fields: Please fill in all required fields.
project.number_positive: The entered number must be greater than 0.
project.marker_description: A marker is the image that your audience has scanned, and the video is played on top of it.
project.start_project_upload_video_file: To start your project, upload the video file here.
project.video_format_mp4: The video format must be MP4.
project.file_must_less_than_10mb: The file must be less than 10 MB.
project.please_follow_guidelines: Please follow these guidelines when creating the project:
project.file_must_glb_format: The 3D file must be in GLB format.
project.file_size_should_15mb: The 3D file size should be under 15 MB.
project.glb_format_must_pbr: In the GLB format, the model's textures must use PBR (Physically Based Rendering).
project.model_size_match_real_world: The model's size in the 3D file should match the real-world dimensions of the product.
project.model_placement_match_sample: The model's placement in the 3D file should match the sample file provided.
project.click_here_to_download_sample: Click here to download the sample file.
project.earring_photos_should_be_transparent: Earring images must be transparent (without a background).
project.image_format_must_png: The image format must be PNG
project.image_size_should_maximum_1mb: The image size should be a maximum of 1 MB.
project.images_should_front_view: Images must be captured in a front-facing view.
project.earring_guide_description1: Top Margin: When preparing the earring photos, ensure the top margin of the image is close to zero. You can crop the images to achieve this. Following this guideline will ensure the earring is placed precisely on the ear in AR mode.
project.earring_guide_description2: Side and Bottom Margins: The left, right, and bottom margins of the image should also be close to zero. This will prevent the earring from appearing too small in AR mode.
project.earring_guide_description3: Image Angle: The earring image should be completely flat and without any angle. If the image has an angle, it must be edited to bring the angle to zero. Paying attention to this will ensure the earring does not appear tilted in AR mode.
project.necklace_photos_should_be_transparent: Necklace photos should be transparent (without a background).
project.necklace_images_should_front_view: The images should be a front view, matching the sample file provided.
project.necklace_guide_description1: Top Margin: When preparing the necklace photos, ensure the top margin of the image is close to zero. You can crop the images to achieve this. Following this guideline will ensure the necklace is placed precisely on the neck in AR mode.
project.necklace_guide_description2: Side and Bottom Margins: The left, right, and bottom margins of the image should also be close to zero. This will prevent the necklace from appearing too small in AR mode.
project.necklace_guide_description3: Image Angle: The necklace image should be completely flat and without any angle. If the image has an angle, it must be edited to bring the angle to zero. Paying attention to this will ensure the necklace does not appear tilted in AR mode.
project.marker_image_description: Marker Image- The image that the user scans to trigger the video playback. Follow these guidelines when choosing the marker image:
project.image_file_format_jpg_png: Image file format must be JPG or PNG.
project.file_size_must_less1mb: File size must be less than 1 MB.
project.video_file_follow_guidelines: Video File- Follow these guidelines when selecting the video:
project.video_file_format_must_mp4: Video file format must be MP4.
project.file_size_must_less_10mb: File size must be less than 10 MB.
project.cta_buttons_description: CTA Buttons- You can set Call-to-Action buttons for your project so users can navigate to desired pages by clicking them. Providing CTA information is optional, and you can choose to include any of the following in your final project:
project.model_size_match_real_world_gamificashio: Resizing is possible in AR mode, but it's best if the model's size in the designed 3D file matches the actual product dimensions.
project.enter_dimensions_curtain_consider_length: To enter the dimensions of the curtain, consider its length and width. If the desired dimensions are not among the options, use the “other” option and write the dimensions in the box.
project.display_wall_covering_and_flooring: To display stone or ceramic materials on walls, select the ‘Wall Covering’ category. To display them on floors, select the ‘Flooring’ category.
project.enter_dimensions_stone_ceramic_flooring_: To enter the dimensions of the Stone & Ceramic, consider its length and width. If the desired dimensions are not among the options, use the “other” option and write the dimensions in the box.
project.enter_dimensions_stone_ceramic_wall_cove: To enter the dimensions of the Stone & Ceramic, consider its length and width. If the desired dimensions are not among the options, use the “other” option and write the dimensions in the box.
project.select_tile_pattern: You can also select the tile pattern layout. Enter the tile pattern layout according to the provided sample in the respective field.
project.enter_dimensions_wallpaper_consider_leng: To enter the dimensions of the Wallpaper, consider its length and width. If the desired dimensions are not among the options, use the “other” option and write the dimensions in the box.
project.image_format_png: The image file format should be PNG.
project.image_size_maximum_1mb: The image size must not exceed 1 MB.
project.image_have_no_margins: The earring image should have no margins or edges, and must be completely cropped from all four sides.
project.images_should_front_view_not_pair: Images must be captured in a front-facing view, showing only a single earring, not a pair.
project.guide_enter_length_width_earring: Enter the earring dimensions according to the provided sample file.
project.necklace_image_have_no_margins: The necklace image should have no margins or edges, and must be completely cropped from all four sides.
project.guide_enter_length_width_necklace: Enter the necklace dimensions according to the provided sample file.
project.circle_carpet_description1: Instead of length and width, enter the diameter of the carpet.
project.circle_carpet_description2: The image file must be in PNG format and have no background (transparent).
project.tie_photos_should_be_transparent: Tie photos should be transparent (without a background).
project.tie_image_have_no_margins: The tie image should have no margins or edges, and must be completely cropped from all four sides.
project.guide_enter_length_width_tie: Enter the tie dimensions according to the provided sample file.
project.upload_limit_exceeded: You can upload a maximum of 10 files.
project.showroom_description:
In this section, you can create a virtual showroom and display different products with all their colors and models in 3D.
Please note the file size limitations. Uploading and editing products is possible until the project is completed.
project.showroom_guideline1: First, select a title and upload a cover image for your showroom.
project.showroom_guideline2: To add each product, upload an image and a 3D model in GLB format. If a product has multiple colors, add all colors with matching names.
project.showroom_guideline3: You can add various products with all their variations to this showroom.
project.showroom_guideline4: To remove a product, click on its thumbnail to reveal the delete button.
project.showroom_guideline5: After uploading all products, click the 'Continue' button to complete your showroom.
project.upload_both_files: Please upload both the image and the 3D file.
project.upload_both_files_to_list: You have not added the latest file to the list. Please add it to the list.
project.title: Name
project.regal_upload_description: Upload your regal images and receive their 3D models
project.regal_files_required: At least one file must be selected
project.regal_auto_glb_usdz_generation: GLB and USDZ files are automatically generated
project.regal_image_info_1: Images should be clear and high quality
project.regal_image_info_4: Images should be without extra margins
project.single_product_multiple_documents: A single product with multiple samples will be created
project.regal_guide_1: First, select the shape of your shelf (rectangle or circle)
project.regal_guide_2: Choose the appropriate size for your shelf
project.regal_guide_3: Upload up to 50 photos of your products
project.regal_guide_4: Each photo size should not exceed 1 megabyte
project.regal_guide_5: Photos must be in PNG or JPG format
project.regal_guide_6: Photos should not have extra margins
project.regal_single_product_info: All photos will be placed in one project
project.regal_circle_shape_info: For circular shape, only enter the diameter
project.regal_rectangle_shape_info: For rectangular shape, enter length and width
project.bulk_upload_description: Drop multiple images and models at once. Files will be auto-paired by name.
project.drop_files_here: Drop your files here or click to browse
project.upload_both_files_same_name: Upload image and model with the same filename (e.g., product1.jpg + product1.glb)
project.upload_model_with_name: Upload a GLB model with this name
project.upload_image_with_name: Upload an image with this name

organization_management.setting_custom_domain_title: Setting up a Custom Domain for webAR Redirect
organization_management.setting_custom_domain_description1: To redirect the provided webAR link to your desired domain, please follow these steps:
organization_management.setting_custom_domain_description2: Define a subdomain on your domain that you wish to use for the webAR experience. For example: ar.yourdomainname.com
organization_management.setting_custom_domain_description3: Point this subdomain to the IP address provided by us (IP: 130.185.78.210). This will allow the webAR link to load on your dedicated subdomain.
organization_management.note_setting_subdomain: Note: You can only set the subdomain for redirecting the webAR link to your domain once. After final confirmation, you will not be able to change the subdomain again. If you are sure about your subdomain selection, click the 'Save' button.
organization_management.setting_showroom_url_title: Setting up a Custom Domain for Showroom
organization_management.setting_showroom_url_description1: To redirect the provided showroom link to your desired domain, please follow these steps:
organization_management.setting_showroom_url_description2: Define a subdomain on your domain that you wish to use for the showroom experience. For example: showroom.yourdomainname.com
organization_management.setting_showroom_url_description3: Point this subdomain to the IP address provided by us (IP: 130.185.78.210). This will allow the showroom link to load on your dedicated subdomain.
organization_management.note_setting_showroom: Note: You can only set the subdomain for redirecting the showroom link to your domain once. After final confirmation, you will not be able to change the subdomain again. If you are sure about your subdomain selection, click the 'Save' button.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.content: At ARMO, our most valuable assets are the users and customers who entrust us and utilize our products. Recognizing the importance of your privacy, we present the 'Privacy Policy' document to provide you with comprehensive insights.
privacy_policy.armo_description: ARMO is dedicated to offering modeling, augmented reality, and virtual reality services in a secure environment, leveraging innovative technologies. In fulfilling this commitment, we pledge transparent communication and safeguarding user data. Information provided, such as name, surname, contact details, and bank information, remains confidential and is not shared with any third parties.
privacy_policy.utilize1: Provision, administration, maintenance, improvement, and facilitation of access to services for all users.
privacy_policy.utilize2: Responding to comments, questions, and requests, offering customer service and support.
privacy_policy.utilize3: Sending technical notices, updates, security alerts, and support information.
privacy_policy.utilize4: Transmitting commercial communications, including details about our products, services, features, surveys, newsletters, offers, improvements, and events related to us.
privacy_policy.utilize5: In the case of ARMO registration, individuals with authorized access to your account or email may view your registered information.
privacy_policy.additional_notes_description:
Users are encouraged to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about updates.
ARMO does not sell or trade user information.
Your data security is of utmost importance to us; we implement robust measures to protect it.
If you have any queries or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@armogroup.tech.

terms_of_use.title: Terms of Use
terms_of_use.content: Welcome to ARMO! By accessing and using ARMO's content, tools, and services, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
terms_of_use.acceptance_description: This text outlines the conditions accepted by users through the viewing or use of ARMO's content, tools, and services. This agreement aims to enhance transparency in the relationship between us, the service provider, and you, the user. In the event of a dispute, this agreement can be utilized for arbitration or legal dispute resolution.
terms_of_use.confirmation_description: By registering in ARMO and using any of our services, users confirm that they have read and accepted the terms outlined in the ‘Terms of Use’ and ‘Privacy Policy’. Users are expected to adhere to the guidelines presented in both documents.
terms_of_use.document_description: As the contents of these documents may be revised and updated by ARMO at any time, users are encouraged to regularly check the related links for updates and changes. Failure to refer to these documents will not prevent the immediate implementation of their provisions.
terms_of_use.intellectual_description: The exclusive ownership and all material and intellectual rights of ARMO, including applied ideas, products, services, and content published on the website armogroup.tech and its subdomains, are reserved. Unauthorized use may lead to legal claims by ARMO to protect its rights.
terms_of_use.confidential_description: By subscribing and using ARMO services, users allow ARMO to receive, review, and analyze all user requests regarding the use of augmented reality services on their sites. Business-related information is considered confidential and will not be provided to any entity except in cases of legal requirement.
terms_of_use.non_confidential_description: ARMO is permitted to process information and traffic for analytical purposes to improve services, develop offerings, and publish reports when needed, ensuring confidentiality.
terms_of_use.password_description: While ARMO encourages strong password usage, it does not accept responsibility for user negligence in password protection. Users are urged to use complex passwords and avoid publishing them.
terms_of_use.digital_description: Digital communication, including notices, emails, text messages, and support responses, replaces traditional methods. Correspondence through these digital methods is legally valid.
terms_of_use.newsletter_description: By creating an ARMO user account, users agree to receive ARMO's newsletter, emails, and text messages. Users can unsubscribe, but ARMO is not responsible for any lack of awareness resulting from non-receipt.
terms_of_use.gift_description: Gift codes, discounts, and amounts given in advertisements and campaigns are for the specified user only, non-transferable, and non-refundable. These amounts are used only for ARMO services.
terms_of_use.termination_description: Canceling the use and non-renewal of any ARMO service means that the user no longer requires related data.
terms_of_use.refund_description: Refunds are possible only if specific conditions are met, including a minimum refundable amount, required documentation, and adherence to certain guidelines.
terms_of_use.pricing_description: Prices are calculated by subscription and are subject to change. Users will be notified of price changes before they become effective.
terms_of_use.unavoidable_description: ARMO is not responsible for non-fulfillment of obligations during unavoidable events such as natural disasters, war, riots, strikes, embargoes, internet outages, and domestic and international communications.

landing.3d_augmented: 3D Augmented: The Next Level for Your Business
landing.empower_online_shoppers_to_visualize_pro:
Empower online shoppers to visualize products like they would do in-store and take
your sales and shopping experience to the next level.
landing.ar_for_carpet_description: Display your carpets in 3D augmented reality before presenting them to customers, allowing them to visualize the carpets in real environments and make more informed purchase decisions.
landing.ar_for_furniture_description: Utilize AR technology, allowing customers to view desired furniture pieces seamlessly incorporated into their actual home decor before finalizing a purchase.
landing.ar_for_home_description: Bring your home appliance products into customers' homes through AR, enabling them to preview how the items will fit and blend with their interior spaces before making a purchase.
landing.ar_for_creative_campaigns_description: Incorporate AR into your marketing campaigns to deliver creative and captivating content that leaves a lasting impression. This interactive and novel experience will make your brand memorable for customers.
landing.ar_for_restaurant_menu_description: Captivate diners by showcasing your restaurant menu in an immersive 3D augmented reality experience, allowing them to preview the actual appearance of dishes before placing their order.
landing.ar_for_shoes_description: With AR, customers can virtually try on desired shoes before purchasing. This unique feature delivers an exciting shopping experience and heightened customer satisfaction for your business.
landing.ar_for_glasses_description: Let customers virtually try on glasses through AR before purchasing, allowing them to see how the frames fit their face and suit their look prior to making a final decision.
landing.ar_for_artwork_description: In art galleries, augmented reality enables virtually providing supplementary artwork information, delivering an enriched experience for visitors.
landing.ar_for_stone_ceramics_description: AR enables virtually showcasing products in real environments for customers. This innovative technology delivers an engaging shopping experience and informed choices for your business.
landing.ar_for_jewelry_description: AR enables virtually previewing jewelry pieces on customers' hands or bodies. This cutting-edge technology delivers an immersive and realistic shopping experience for customers while significantly increasing sales potential for your business.
landing.ar_for_wallpapers_description: In wallpaper, AR allows customers to virtually preview designs and colors before installation. This unique technology enables more accurate choices and a hassle-free shopping experience for customers and your business.
landing.ar_for_watches_description: For wristwatches, AR enables virtual try-ons of various models for customers. This innovative technology facilitates informed choices and increases sales potential for your business.
landing.ar_for_industries_description: AR enables your business to showcase products in a realistic 3D manner. This technology allows you to engage customers through captivating and interactive product displays, deliver hands-on training, and offer a unique user experience when introducing your products.
landing.ar_for_sportswear_description: AR allows you to preview clothing and footwear in 3D on virtual mannequins, enriching the shopping experience for customers.
landing.ar_for_hats_description: AR allows hat retailers to virtually preview various hat styles in 3D on customers' heads, enhancing the shopping experience and boosting customer satisfaction.
landing.ar_for_toys_description: AR can revolutionize toys and children's play by bringing game objects and characters into the real world in 3D, allowing kids to interact with them. This makes playtime more engaging and immersive.
landing.innovative_marketing_description: Augmented Reality offers innovative and creative solutions for marketing your products and services.
landing.increased_sales_description: By providing unique and captivating experiences to customers, Augmented Reality can boost your sales and revenue.
landing.enriched_user_experience_description: AR offers interactive and entertaining opportunities for customers, fostering increased engagement and loyalty towards your brand.
landing.about_us_footer: At ARmo, we're shaping the future today. With cutting-edge Augmented Reality technology, we revolutionize your customer interactions, empowering your business to lead the way. Join the next marketing and user experience revolution.
landing.armo_address: No. 31, Azadi innovation factory, Azadi Square, Lashkari Highway, Tehran, 1391955413, Iran
landing.all_rights_reserved: All rights of this site are owned by Afaq Roshan Marzha-ye Vaghei'at (ARMO) Company.
landing.description71: of consumers prefer to shop on sites that offer augmented reality shopping
landing.reported_by_brands: Reported by brands that have adopted 3D & augmented reality in their online shopping experience
landing.physical_to_digital_description: With the Armo platform, your physical products are transformed into 3D digital files, creating an innovative and engaging experience for your customers.
landing.manage_everywhere_description: Control your 3D and augmented reality files on the Armo platform, seamlessly integrating them into your website, app, and social media channels.
landing.analyze_data_description: Measure and examine the impact of utilizing 3D and augmented reality content in your business using powerful data analytics tools.
landing.ready_for_ar: Are You Ready to Use AR?
landing.ready_for_ar_description: It's time to stand out and create a lasting impression with your products. With Armo, a world of digital possibilities awaits you. Make the decision today and take your first steps into a new realm of opportunities.
landing.limited_special_offer_part1: Only until the end of this month
landing.ar_for_automobiles_description: With AR, customers can virtually view and customize cars with different colors and options. This technology makes the car selection experience simpler and more exciting.
landing.ar_for_digital_products_description: With AR, customers can experience digital product features interactively in 3D. This capability makes selecting the right product easier for customers.
landing.summer_hot_title: Summer Heat is ON, Deals are BLAZING!
landing.summer_ar_plans: All AR Plans - Limited Time Only
landing.summer_festival_ar: Beat the Heat Sale - Ends July 6th!

about.about_us_description: Armo is a pioneering startup in the field of augmented reality and virtual reality technologies. We empower e-commerce businesses to showcase their products in a unique and captivating way, delivering an extraordinary shopping experience for their customers.
about.our_story_description1: Armo stemmed from a simple yet revolutionary idea: bridging the gap between customers' perceptions of a product and their real-life experience. We are a team of technology experts who, through our knowledge and creativity, have developed an ingenious solution to this challenge.
about.our_story_description2: We offer an innovative approach that enables companies to seamlessly virtualize 3D models of their products in real-world environments, without the need for specialized programming expertise. This remarkable capability allows customers to visualize products in their actual living or working spaces before making a purchase.
about.our_mission_description: Armo's mission is to transform online shopping into a delightful, awe-inspiring, and unparalleled experience for every customer.
about.join_us_description: Are you passionate about technology and innovation? If so, join the Armo team. We always welcome top talents from various technology fields to collaborate and shape a bright future for the online shopping experience.

our_solutions.ar_solutions_description1: Create a Different and Exciting Online Shopping Experience!
our_solutions.ar_solutions_description2: Armo brings cutting-edge augmented reality technology to e-commerce businesses. With this innovative company's solutions, you can showcase your products in an engaging and unique way without the need for programming and at an affordable cost. Provide your customers with a special online shopping experience and benefit from the latest technologies.
our_solutions.furniture_description1: Increased Sales with a Reassuring Shopping Experience
our_solutions.furniture_description2: When it comes to buying furniture and home decor items online, customers often face many questions and uncertainties:
our_solutions.furniture_description3: is this sofa too large for the living room?
our_solutions.furniture_description4: Does this bookcase match our decor?
our_solutions.furniture_description5: will this chair look good in our space?
our_solutions.furniture_description6: These doubts can lead to abandoned carts or hesitant purchases. With Armo's augmented reality, customers will be able to view products in 3D from all angles. They can place items in their actual space and precisely evaluate the size, fit, style, and color.
our_solutions.furniture_description7: By resolving customer uncertainties and doubts, your online conversion rates and sales will see a remarkable increase. Augmented reality provides customers with greater confidence and encourages them to purchase your products.
our_solutions.carpet_description1: Precise Rug Selection, An Expectation Fulfilled
our_solutions.carpet_description2: Choosing the right rug for your home is one of the most challenging decisions in interior decoration. Questions such as:
our_solutions.carpet_description3: Will this color match the room decor?
our_solutions.carpet_description4: Is this rug size too large or too small for my space? Does the pattern and texture align with my desired style?
our_solutions.carpet_description5: These questions preoccupy many customers' minds and can lead to hesitation in online purchasing.
our_solutions.carpet_description6: With Armo's augmented reality, there is no need to worry. Customers can virtually place desired rugs in their actual home environment. This allows for a precise evaluation of the color, size, pattern, and material in their real living space.
our_solutions.carpet_description7: Reducing doubts and uncertainties in online rug purchases leads to increased customer confidence and, consequently, growth in your sales. Armo's augmented reality provides a delightful and reassuring shopping experience for customers.
our_solutions.fashion_description1: A Digital Storefront for Your Online Clothing Store
our_solutions.fashion_description2: Have an engaging and realistic digital storefront that encourages customers to make purchases.
our_solutions.fashion_description3: Allow online customers to try on clothes and view them from different angles, just like in a physical store.
our_solutions.fashion_description4: Provide them with an experience similar to in-person shopping, addressing all concerns about size, color, and style.
our_solutions.fashion_description5: With augmented reality, customers can place virtual mannequins in their homes and evaluate products in a real environment.
our_solutions.fashion_description6: Armo's platform is designed specifically for fashion and clothing brands, leveraging 3D and augmented reality technologies to elevate the online shopping experience to a new level.
our_solutions.fashion_description7: Resolving customer uncertainties and hesitations in online clothing purchases leads to increased confidence and willingness to buy. Armo's augmented reality offers a delightful and regret-free shopping experience for customers, resulting in increased sales for your brand.
our_solutions.footwear_description1: Your Online Store, More Realistic Than Ever
our_solutions.footwear_description2: Armo's augmented reality solutions enable you to create an online shoe store that is highly engaging and similar to physical stores. With this advanced technology:
our_solutions.footwear_description3: Customers can view shoes from all angles and virtually try them on, just like in a real store.
our_solutions.footwear_description4: Customers' concerns about the color, style, and quality of the shoes are addressed.
our_solutions.footwear_description5: It reduces the return rate for online shoe purchases.
our_solutions.footwear_description6: Armo creates a delightful and satisfying experience for customers, paving the way for increased sales and growth in your footwear business.
our_solutions.footwear_description7: It also allows you to save on marketing and advertising costs, as customers will have greater motivation to purchase after seeing the products in a realistic manner.
our_solutions.eyewear_description1: A Different Experience for Buying Glasses
our_solutions.eyewear_description2: For many customers, online eyewear shopping comes with the following uncertainties:
our_solutions.eyewear_description3: How will these glasses look on my face?
our_solutions.eyewear_description4: is this eyeglass frame suitable for my face shape?
our_solutions.eyewear_description5: Which color is more suitable for me?
our_solutions.eyewear_description6: Armo's augmented reality eliminates these barriers. It allows your customers to view glasses in 3D and virtually try them on their face.
our_solutions.eyewear_description7: This experience makes online shopping enjoyable and akin to shopping in-store, increasing your website's conversion rate and sales.
our_solutions.jewelry_description1: Increase Jewelry Sales with an Exceptional Shopping Experience
our_solutions.jewelry_description2: Your customers no longer need to hesitate when choosing suitable jewelry. By offering virtual try-on for jewelry, your online sales will flourish. According to statistics:
our_solutions.jewelry_description3: The likelihood of purchasing jewelry increases 11 times with the availability of virtual try-on.
our_solutions.jewelry_description4: 55% of online shoppers prefer to view desired jewelry using augmented reality.
our_solutions.jewelry_description5: 75% of online shoppers expect retailers to provide an augmented reality experience for jewelry.
our_solutions.jewelry_description6: By offering virtual jewelry try-on through Armo, customers can view various pieces of jewelry on their face or hands.
our_solutions.jewelry_description7: This delightful experience will lead to a remarkable increase in conversion rates and sales.
our_solutions.home_and_kitchen_description1: The Joy of Shopping for Home Appliances Without Worries
our_solutions.home_and_kitchen_description2: For home appliance brands, the challenges and issues customers face when shopping online typically include the following:
our_solutions.home_and_kitchen_description3: Have you ever encountered the challenge where the customer cannot envision the actual size and dimensions of the product?
our_solutions.home_and_kitchen_description4: Or the customer is concerned about the product's style and color not matching their home decor?
our_solutions.home_and_kitchen_description5: Or the customer wants to see the product from all angles, but this is not possible with online shopping?
our_solutions.home_and_kitchen_description6: By leveraging Armo's augmented reality, customers can virtually place home appliances such as refrigerators, dishwashers, coffee makers, and more in their real environment and view them from all angles.
our_solutions.home_and_kitchen_description7: This will completely eliminate ambiguities and provide your customers with a delightful shopping experience.
our_solutions.ar_video_description1: Dynamic and Engaging Printed Content with Augmented Reality
our_solutions.ar_video_description2: For businesses that have printed products such as catalogs, business cards, posters, etc., creating more appeal and interaction with the audience has always been a challenge. But now, with Armo's augmented reality, you can:
our_solutions.ar_video_description3: Transform static printed content into dynamic, animated, and engaging content.
our_solutions.ar_video_description4: Enable more interaction with the audience and provide more comprehensive information about your products.
our_solutions.ar_video_description5: Offer a unique experience of your products by placing a QR code to display augmented reality videos.
our_solutions.ar_video_description6: With Armo's augmented reality, your printed content will no longer be limited or boring.
our_solutions.ar_video_description7: Increased audience interaction and captivating appeal will lead to higher conversion rates.
our_solutions.cosmetics_description1: Smart Cosmetics Selection: Confidence in Your Beauty Choices
our_solutions.cosmetics_description2: When shopping for cosmetics online, customers often face numerous uncertainties:
our_solutions.cosmetics_description3: Is this lipstick shade right for my skin tone?
our_solutions.cosmetics_description4: Will this eyeshadow look natural on me?
our_solutions.cosmetics_description5: Does this concealer provide the coverage I need?
our_solutions.cosmetics_description6: These doubts often lead customers to avoid purchasing cosmetics online or to make their purchase with hesitation and uncertainty.
our_solutions.cosmetics_description7: With Armo's augmented reality, customers can virtually try on cosmetics on their faces. They can experiment with different colors under various lighting conditions and preview the final result before making a purchase. Armo provides the convenience of virtual testing, ensuring a confident and enjoyable shopping experience for your customers.

send_notification.title: Title
send_notification.title_min_error: Title must be at least 2 characters
send_notification.title_max_error: Title cannot be longer than 200 characters
send_notification.message_min_error: Message must be at least 2 characters
send_notification.message_max_error: Message cannot be longer than 500 characters

how_it_works.intro_products: Do you want to introduce your products to customers in an attractive and unique way?
how_it_works.bring_digital: With Armo, you can bring your products to the digital world and make them stand out.
how_it_works.upload_instructions: If you already have 3D files of your products, you can easily upload them to the Armo platform. With just a few simple clicks, QR codes and 360-degree and AR viewing links will be generated for each of your products. These links are web-based and can be easily shared on your website, app, and social media channels.
how_it_works.convert_images: Convert Product Images to 3D and AR
how_it_works.convert_instructions: If you don't have a 3D file of your product, don't worry. Armo's team of experts is ready to receive high-quality images of your product from different angles. They will then skillfully and precisely design a 3D model of your product. After that, you can upload the model to the platform and receive 360-degree and augmented reality viewing links for sharing.
how_it_works.ease_of_use: On the Armo platform, you have access to your personal user account. Through this, you can easily manage your 3D files, 360-degree viewing links, and augmented reality files, and share them wherever needed.
how_it_works.integrate_share: Integration and Sharing Everywhere, for Every Project:
how_it_works.provide_link_qr: For every 3D or augmented reality project you create on the platform, you will be provided with a link and QR code. You can place this link and QR code on your website or app.
how_it_works.data_analysis: Data Analysis, Tracking, and Measurement of Results:
how_it_works.track_results: The Armo platform dashboard allows you to track and measure the results of using your 3D and augmented reality content. You can view visit statistics, click rates, and other metrics.
how_it_works.ar_products_description: Augmented reality can be used for various products, including furniture, household items, clothing, shoes, and even food and beverages.
how_it_works.guide_support: The Armo platform is designed to be simple and user-friendly. It doesn't matter how familiar you are with 3D and AR because we are here to support you and guide you through every step of the process.

pricing.pricing_title_1: Still hesitant? We are here for you
pricing.pricing_description_1: If you have doubts about choosing the right Armo plan and services, don't worry. Our experts are ready to answer all your questions to help you make the best choice.
pricing.pricing_title_2: Looking for new features? Share your ideas with us
pricing.pricing_description_2: At Armo, we are constantly expanding our features and services. Your ideas and suggestions can guide us on this path. Share whatever comes to your mind with us.

errors.403_description: Unfortunately, you do not have permission to access this page.

posts.post_error_save: Error occurred while saving the post

faq.a1: We provide a web-based augmented reality service that can be used without the need to install an application. Customers can create augmented reality projects by uploading photos or 3D models of their products.
faq.q2: How can I start using Armo's service?
faq.a2: To get started, you can register through our website and create an account. Then you can select one of our subscription plans and begin uploading your products.
faq.q3: What is the output format of Armo's service?
faq.a3: The output for all projects is provided in the form of a link and QR code.
faq.q4: Where can Armo's service be used?
faq.a5: We offer our service in the form of subscription plans that you can choose based on your needs. For detailed pricing information, please contact us.
faq.q6: How long does it take to set up and use Armo's service?
faq.a6: Setting up and using our service is very quick and easy. You can instantly and automatically create and use your augmented reality projects. This rapid process allows you to present your products in augmented reality to customers without delay.
faq.q7: If we don't have a 3D model, how can we use Armo's service?
faq.a7: If you don't have a 3D model, we can create one for you. You just need to provide us with photos, specifications, and precise dimensions of the product.
faq.q8: Is it possible to generate reports on service usage?
faq.a8: Yes, users can access reports related to the use of the AR service in their account.
faq.a9: Yes, we can use the customer's custom URL for augmented reality projects.
faq.q10: Are the dimensions of products in augmented reality accurate?
faq.a10: Yes, all products are displayed in augmented reality with precise and real-life sizes.
faq.faq_contact: If you need more information, please contact us.

call_to_action.title: Ready to Start Your Digital Transformation?
call_to_action.description: Our experts will introduce solutions tailored to your business when you request a demo

faq.faq_carpet_q1: Do I need to install any specific application to use the Armo platform?
faq.faq_carpet_a1: No, one of the main advantages of the Armo platform is that it's entirely web-based. You only need a browser to access and utilize all its features.
faq.faq_carpet_q2: What content do I need to prepare my carpet collection for the ARMO augmented reality platform?
faq.faq_carpet_a2: To display each carpet in the augmented reality platform, you only need a high-quality front view image of the carpet. This image should be without extra margins and exactly like the images typically used on carpet sales websites. For the best augmented reality display quality, the image must be taken directly from the front.
faq.faq_carpet_q3: How does the AI consultant assist customers?
faq.faq_carpet_a3: The Armo smart consultant analyzes interior design images using advanced AI algorithms to identify design styles. It then recommends the most suitable rugs from your collection based on colors, patterns, and decoration style.
faq.faq_carpet_q4: Can I monitor product performance on the platform?
faq.faq_carpet_a4: Yes, Armo's smart management panel provides complete tracking of customer behavior and product performance. You can view analytical reports on product views, customer interactions, conversion rates, and many other metrics.
faq.faq_carpet_q5: Does the virtual showroom work on all devices?
faq.faq_carpet_a5: Yes, Armo's virtual showroom is compatible with all devices including mobile phones, tablets, and computers. Its user interface is designed to provide a seamless shopping experience on any device, with optimized loading speed and performance.
faq.faq_carpet_q6: How long does it take to convert rug images to augmented reality?
faq.faq_carpet_a6: Armo's image processing system uses cutting-edge technology to convert regular rug images into AR models in just seconds. This process is fully automated and requires no user intervention or complex settings.
faq.faq_carpet_q7: What advantages does the virtual rack offer for online sales?
faq.faq_carpet_a7: The virtual rack is a powerful tool for online sales sessions that enables quick display and switching between different rug models in real environments. Salespeople can quickly showcase different designs during video calls and make precise comparisons between options.

makeup.transform_your_online_beauty_retail_expe:
Transform your online beauty retail experience with cutting-edge AR technology that lets
customers try before they buy.
makeup.why_beauty_brands_choose_ar: Why Beauty Brands Choose AR Technology
makeup.our_advanced_ar_system_enables_customers: Our advanced AR system enables customers to visualize products with exceptional accuracy, transforming the online shopping experience.
makeup.brands_using_virtual_try_on_technology_r: Brands using virtual try-on technology report a 40% increase in conversion rates and 50% reduction in returns.
makeup.faq_makeup_a1: No! Our system is entirely web-based with no hardware requirements.
makeup.faq_makeup_q2: How long is the implementation process?
makeup.faq_makeup_a2: Less than 24 hours - fastest in the industry!
makeup.faq_makeup_a3: Simple implementation with a single code snippet.
makeup.faq_makeup_q4: Is it compatible with my website?
makeup.faq_makeup_a4: Yes! Compatible with all major e-commerce platforms and custom websites.
makeup.contact_us_now_for_free_consultation_sta: Contact us now to start your partnership and receive free consultation.

3d_modeling.digital_objects_creation: 3D modeling is the process of creating digital objects using specialized software that enables product visualization from all angles. This technology allows businesses to showcase their products accurately and realistically to customers before production.
3d_modeling.visualization_product_detailed_view: High-fidelity product visualization with precise details
3d_modeling.interactive_shopping: AR integration for interactive shopping experiences
3d_modeling.reduced_design_cost: Reduced design and physical prototyping costs
3d_modeling.initial_design_description2: Initial concept design and technical specification
3d_modeling.professional_modeling_description1: Model creation using advanced software solutions
3d_modeling.texturing_materials_description1: Realistic material application and precise texturing
3d_modeling.why_choose_us_description3: Ongoing technical support and after-delivery services
3d_modeling.d3_modelling_a1: Pricing is based on model complexity, quantity, required quality, and delivery timeline. Contact our experts for detailed quotations.
3d_modeling.d3_modelling_q2: What is the typical turnaround time for a 3D model?
3d_modeling.d3_modelling_a2: Delivery time ranges from 3 days to 2 weeks depending on project complexity. Custom timelines are available for large-scale projects.
3d_modeling.d3_modelling_q3: Can models be modified after delivery?
3d_modeling.d3_modelling_a3: Yes, we offer up to 3 rounds of revisions at no additional cost to ensure your complete satisfaction.
3d_modeling.d3_modelling_q4: What file formats do you deliver?
3d_modeling.d3_modelling_a4: We provide models in standard formats including GLB, GLTF, FBX, OBJ, and AR-compatible formats.
3d_modeling.d3_modelling_a5: Yes, all models are optimized for web and mobile platforms with appropriate file size optimization per platform.

digital_space_design.transform_the_way_you_showcase_products: Transform the Way You Showcase Products and Services
digital_space_design.introducing_products_and_services_is_a_g: In today’s fast-paced, competitive market, effectively introducing your products and services is a game-changer.
digital_space_design.expert_team_with_cutting_edge_technologi: Our expert team harnesses cutting-edge technologies to offer innovative, interactive solutions tailored to elevate your brand.
digital_space_design.interior_design_brands_and_suppliers_we_: For interior design brands and suppliers, we provide dynamic tools to enhance product presentation:
digital_space_design.automotive_sector_presentations: For dealerships and car manufacturers, we deliver immersive, interactive platforms:
digital_space_design.explore_color_and_feature_variations: Instantly explore color and feature variations.
digital_space_design.hosting_exhibitions_and_showcasing_colle: For hosting exhibitions and showcasing collections:
digital_space_design.technical_insights_and_catalogs: Provide technical insights with interactive catalogs.
digital_space_design.host_live_online_events: Host live online events and demos.
digital_space_design.architectural_firms_and_realestate_devel: For architectural firms and real estate developers, we bring your visions to life:
digital_space_design.present_material_and_design_details: Present material and design choices vividly.
digital_space_design.offer_detailed_insights_to_investors: Offer detailed insights to attract investors.
digital_space_design.customized_client_experiences: Customize experiences to match client preferences.
digital_space_design.maximize_product_presentation_impact: Maximize the impact of your product presentations.
digital_space_design.reduce_marketing_costs: Slash marketing costs with smarter solutions.
digital_space_design.products_accessible_anytime_anywhere: Keep products accessible to customers anytime, anywhere.
digital_space_design.effortlessly_update_content: Effortlessly update and refresh your content.
digital_space_design.deliver_memorable_customer_experience: Deliver a truly memorable experience for your audience.
digital_space_design.leverage_advanced_technology: Discover how our advanced technology can revolutionize the way you engage with your customers. Reach out to us today to take your business to the next level.
digital_space_design.faq_3dvista_q1: Do users need to install any special software to use the virtual tour?
digital_space_design.faq_3dvista_a1: No, all our interactive content is web-based and users only need a standard browser to access all features.
digital_space_design.faq_3dvista_q2: What are the implementation costs and timeframes?
digital_space_design.faq_3dvista_a2: Implementation costs and timeframes vary depending on the project type, number of products, and required interaction level. Contact our experts for a free consultation and accurate cost and time estimate.
digital_space_design.faq_3dvista_q3: Can the virtual tour content be updated in the future?
digital_space_design.faq_3dvista_a3: Yes, our system is designed to be completely flexible. You can easily update content, add new products, and make changes to different sections. This feature allows you to keep your interactive content up-to-date as your business evolves.
digital_space_design.faq_3dvista_a4: Yes, all our interactive content is responsive and works well on all devices including mobile phones, tablets, and computers. The user interface intelligently adapts to different screen sizes.
digital_space_design.faq_3dvista_q5: What is the limit on the number of products or spaces that can be displayed in a virtual tour?
digital_space_design.faq_3dvista_a5: While there's no strict limit on the number of products, we recommend keeping it under 50 items to maintain optimal system performance and speed. This optimal range ensures the best user experience.
digital_space_design.faq_3dvista_q6: Can the user interface be customized to match our brand?
digital_space_design.faq_3dvista_a6: Yes, all user interface elements are customizable. Colors, fonts, logos, and other visual elements can be adjusted to match your brand identity, creating a seamless experience for your audience.

eyewear.smart_virtual_tryon_solution_for_eyewear: Smart Virtual Try-On Solution for Eyewear Retailers
eyewear.transform_your_customer_experience_with_: Transform your customer experience with augmented reality technology that boosts sales and reduces returns significantly.
eyewear.why_do_eyewear_retailers_need: Why Do Eyewear Retailers Need This Technology?
eyewear.ar_powered_shopping_experiences_increase: AR-powered shopping experiences increase conversion rates by up to 40%. Customers buy more confidently and in higher volumes.
eyewear.our_partner_stores_have_experienced_10_5: Our partner stores have experienced a 10% to 50% reduction in return rates. Stop losing money on returns.
eyewear.over_60_customers_prefer_retailers_offer: Over 60% of customers prefer retailers offering AR experiences. Stay ahead of your competition.
eyewear.our_virtual_tryon_technology_enables_cus: Our virtual try-on technology enables customers to preview products using their camera and AR before making a purchase. This user-friendly solution integrates seamlessly with any e-commerce platform, helping buyers make confident purchasing decisions.
eyewear.our_technology_displays_your_products_fr: Our technology displays your products - from prescription glasses to sunglasses and colored contact lenses - in true-to-life size, color, and appearance at a 1:1 scale. This ensures customers choose products that perfectly match their face.
eyewear.try_before_you_buy: Try Before You Buy: Customers can see products on their face and purchase with complete confidence.
eyewear.fewer_returns_mean_happier_customers: Fewer returns mean happier customers. Let your customers shop with confidence.
eyewear.stand_out_with_every_click: Stand out with every click. Our advanced virtual try-on technology provides a personalized, unique experience for your customers.
eyewear.most_advanced_facial_landmark_detection: Most advanced facial landmark detection engine for precise eyewear fitting
eyewear.true_to_life_rendering_of_lens_colors: True-to-life rendering of lens colors and frame materials
eyewear.automatic_size_adjustment_to_customer_fa: Automatic size adjustment to customer face dimensions
eyewear.faq_eyewear_q1: How does virtual try-on work on the website?
eyewear.faq_eyewear_a1: Our virtual try-on technology uses augmented reality (AR) to let customers preview products on their face before purchase. Using the device camera, the selected product is overlaid on the user's live image. Advanced algorithms ensure the product adapts to user movements and fits accurately based on facial recognition.
eyewear.faq_eyewear_a2: Each product receives a dedicated AR link and QR code that can be easily embedded in the product page. You can either: Upload your existing 3D models to our platform and instantly receive AR links, Or send us product images (front and side views) according to our guidelines, and we'll handle the preparation
eyewear.faq_eyewear_a3: After receiving product images according to our guidelines (front and side views), implementation typically takes 2-3 weeks depending on the number of models. With existing 3D models, implementation is much faster, taking less than 24 hours.
eyewear.faq_eyewear_q4: Do we need to send physical products?
eyewear.faq_eyewear_a4: No, we only need high-quality front and side view images of each product. If you have 3D models of your products, you can directly upload them to our platform.
eyewear.faq_eyewear_q5: Is this solution compatible with our website?
eyewear.faq_eyewear_a5: Yes, our solution works with all WordPress sites and custom-built websites. AR links and QR codes can be easily implemented on any platform.
